imports:
import Checkbox from "@kiwicom/orbit-components/lib/Checkbox";
import Tooltip from "@kiwicom/orbit-components/lib/Tooltip";
example:
() => (
  <Checkbox
    label="Direct"
    disabled
    tooltip={
      <Tooltip
        content="No results for direct connections"
        preferredPosition="top"
      />
    }
  />
)

info.title: Tooltip
info.description: If you want to attach a tooltip only to the checkbox itself and not the label or any other text, use the tooltip prop.
